SEARCH
Package shapes

Class Line

java.lang.Object
alexlewis9.shapes.Shape
alexlewis9.shapes.Line
public class Line extends Shape
The alexlewis9.shapes.Line class represents a double-precision alexlewis9.shapes.Line segment that can be drawn using the Processing library. It also focuses on the ability to detect intersections with other Lines.

  • Field Summary

    • LineAngle

      public static Line LineAngle(double x1, double y1, double l, double a)
      Returns a alexlewis9.shapes.Line with given start points, length, and angle.
      Parameters:
      x1 - X-coordinate of start point.
      y1 - Y-coordinate of start point.
      l - The length of the line.
      a - Angle in degrees between line and 3 o'clock.
      Returns:
      a alexlewis9.shapes.Line with given start points, length, and angle.

    • draw

      public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws the line to the given Processing PApplet.
      Overrides:
      draw in class Shape
      Parameters:
      drawer - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the alexlewis9.shapes.Line.
      Preconditions:
      The alexlewis9.shapes.Line will be drawn with attributes previously set on the given PApplet.
      Postconditions:
      Side effect - drawer is set to: marker.stroke(r, g, b), marker.fill(r, g, b)
